document.full_text: chinese premier wen jiabao assured his pakistani counterpart yusuf raza gilani of china's "all-weather friendship" on wednesday, during a visit that sharply contrasted with anger between washington and islamabad.
document.title: china vows lasting support for troubled pakistan
lines_and_colors: chinese premier wen jiabao assured his pakistani counterpart yusuf raza gilani of china's "all-weather friendship" on wednesday, during a visit that sharply contrasted with anger between washington and islamabad.
